node.title: Cross Roads: The Highway to Healing
node.description:
This lecture will focus on the power of love in restoring the mind and body. We will look at how Christ’s love has the ability to restore the broken heart of anyone willing to come to him for healing. 

 

Objectives: 

 

To review the neurobiology of love. To understand how the love of Christ provides mental, emotional, social and physical healing. To integrate Christ’s love in addressing the mental health needs of patients. For the clinician to learn to apply the principles of the cross to his or her own life to improve competency in mental health treatment.
